TODAY 2PM (BST) : Watch Help Callum, our new 360 experience.

https://t.co/IHC3th9cP9

#FloodAware #Flood #FloodResilience https://t.co/eilacfPVba

We‚Äôve been notified by @LRT of cases of #MittenCrabs in the #Lune estuary. Mitten Crabs can harm river embankments & native species. 

Please remember to check, clean & dry to reduce the spread of invasive species.

To report sightings & for more info: https://t.co/3PnEARbPp0 https://t.co/pfYAdVdo1p

tweets.text: @AndynBrown16 @UllswaterCic @EnvAgencyNW @EnvAgency You should be proud of those old war wounds. He loves me really @UllswaterCic
@UllswaterCic @EnvAgencyNW @EnvAgency trust me... been their and got the scar's ! ü§£
@D_1983_D @EnvAgencyMids @Trent_R_Trust @TrentGateway @Nottswildlife @theriverstrust They are in the river all year but gather on mass in the autumn
@JackPerksPhoto @Trent_R_Trust @TrentGateway @Nottswildlife @EnvAgencyMids @theriverstrust Are they native?
@JackPerksPhoto @EnvAgencyMids @Trent_R_Trust @TrentGateway @Nottswildlife @theriverstrust Not true, these were being caught in June on the lower Trent.
@JackPerksPhoto @Trent_R_Trust @TrentGateway @Nottswildlife @EnvAgencyMids @theriverstrust Should be a good time to cull them then. But how?

Today we let the water through our first completed #FishPassage the RiverSevern üôå #LetItFlow #FishPassage @severnrivers @EnvAgencyMids @CRTWalesandSW @CanalRiverTrust @fishmigration @LIFEprogramme @HeritageFundM_E @kiergroup https://t.co/DvPy25LSuh

tweets.text: @EnvAgencyNW @EnvAgency You could do with a whole team of Olly's. Great person to work with and make things happen

Our amazing new online virtual consultation room for the Tadcaster Flood Alleviation Scheme has gone live. Click here to see options & give your feedback: https://t.co/RQJ5ohhfua
Please share with family & friends.
Details also being posted out with Tadcaster Today newsletter. https://t.co/kleBgq0W8p

Check this out at 2pm TODAY! This project with @EEIatHull @CUIDARProject @LancasterUni @SeriousGeoGames  & @EnvAgency has turned Callum's experience of flooding into a virtual experience for all. Please share! 

#research #floods #resilience #FloodAware https://t.co/zl3xFTXeoN

In the autumn chinese mitten crabs migrate to saltwater to breed which means many UK rivers that they have invaded start to see large numbers in the lower reaches like this one in the River Trent. @Trent_R_Trust  @TrentGateway @Nottswildlife @EnvAgencyMids @theriverstrust https://t.co/mlavxNo0Ff
